title: Niyog
description: AI-powered job matching platform that provides personalized job recommendations based on user skills and preferences. Features smart filtering, real-time notifications, and comprehensive job search capabilities with over 100,000+ downloads.

title: MUV
description: Advanced mobility and transportation application with real-time tracking, route optimization, and seamless user experience. Built with modern Android architecture and clean design principles.

title: MUV HRT
description: Heart rate monitoring integration for the MUV platform, featuring health tracking, data analytics, and personalized insights for enhanced user wellness and safety.

title: GRID Furniture
description: Modern furniture e-commerce platform for ergonomic office and home furniture. Features comprehensive product catalog, user-friendly shopping experience, and premium quality furniture solutions at budget-friendly costs. Serves 3,000+ customers with elegant designs.

title: Frontliner
description: Essential services management platform designed for frontline workers, featuring task management, communication tools, and workflow optimization for improved efficiency.
